mapper.select: SELECT B.TAG_ID,C.TAG_NAME FROM BLOG_TAG B,TAG_INFO C WHERE C.TAG_ID=B.TAG_ID AND B.BLOG_ID = #{blogId}

SELECT F.TAG_ID, F.TAG_NAME, COUNT(F.BLOG_ID) TAG_NUM FROM (SELECT A.BLOG_ID,IFNULL(D.TAG_ID,-1) TAG_ID,IFNULL(D.TAG_NAME,'未标记') TAG_NAME FROM (SELECT B.BLOG_ID FROM BLOG_ARTICLE B WHERE B.USER_ID = #{userId} AND B.STATE_CD = '1') A LEFT JOIN (SELECT C.TAG_ID,C.TAG_NAME,BG.BLOG_ID FROM TAG_INFO C,BLOG_TAG BG WHERE BG.USER_ID = #{userId} AND BG.TAG_ID=C.TAG_ID) D ON D.BLOG_ID=A.BLOG_ID) F GROUP BY F.TAG_ID,F.TAG_NAME ORDER BY F.TAG_ID DESC
